name: StarLocked
description:
After the crew of Delta StarLine mysteriously vanished, Unit 66 wakes up after being attacked. Being guided by the strange AI called DOLOS (Data Operation's Line of Security), Unit 66 discovers the strange and tragic fate of the crew, and uncovers the secret behind the Delta StarLine space cruiser.

Coder: Big Jones

Modeler: Joe Imisson

UI Guy: Leslie Kara
